name: @obsidianplus/host
description: Native host for Chrome extension to manage Obsidian vaults

scripts.nw-win: nwbuild --mode build --platform win --arch x64 --flavor normal --zip true --outDir releases/windows --glob=false ./nwapp
scripts.nw-linux: nwbuild --mode build --platform linux --arch x64 --flavor normal --zip true --outDir releases/linux --glob=false ./nwapp
scripts.nw-mac: nwbuild --mode build --platform osx --arch x64 --flavor normal --zip true --outDir releases/mac --glob=false ./nwapp
scripts.nw-all: npm run nw-win && npm run nw-linux && npm run nw-mac
